programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Pelottavia ja koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksen jalkeen sinnikkaasti hengestaan esteista tai seuraamuksista huolimatta.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kalliin hintaluokan kustomoituja autoja ja harvinaisia malleja suunnitteleva yritys tilaa eksoottisen akvaarion. Valtavasta kolmitahoisesta akvaariosta tulee sen keskipiste!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 8. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: 2. kausi alkaa uusintana. Osa 1. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Talven tuloon on enaa viikkoja, ja perheet yrittavat tayttaa ruokavarastojaan. Heimo ja Charlie pelkaavat, ettei heilla ole tarpeeksi lihaa talveksi.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Harmaakarhu hyokkasi kaksi kertaa Montanan vuoristossa vaeltamassa olleen Todd Orrin paalle. Bahamalla snorklaamassa ollut Tiffany Johnson kohtasi tiikerihain.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Jackson auttaa yksihuoltajaaitia, jonka Pickles-kissa pelottelee taman lapsia. Lucifer-kissan pirullinen pakkomielle ruokaan saattaa vieda sen hengen.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 3/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Big Cat Tales
programme.desc: Jonathan loytaa salaisen luolan, missa Dada-naarasleijona pitaa vastasyntyneita poikasiaan. Olare-leopardi esittaa harvoin nahdyn parittelurituaalin.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Ahmittuaan kaikki kaverinsa ruuat, nalkainen merikilpikonna loytaa paikan, jossa han voi syoda rauhassa. Lisaksi kaksi maitovalasta toivotetaan tervetulleeksi uuteen kotiin.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Epatoivoinen omistaja tuo vastaanotolle kultaisennoutajan, jonka jalka on murtunut. Jeff ryhmineen hoitaa myos beaglea, jonka kimppuun toinen koira on hyokannyt.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: NASCAR-kuljettaja Kurt Busch ja hanen vaimonsa haluavat akvaarioonsa pikku paratiisin. He tilaavat pienoismallin haapaikastaan!

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 3. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 4. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan elainlaakari Dee Thornellin elamaa Alaskan rajaseudulla. Hanen monenkarvaiseen asiakaskuntaansa kuuluu elaimia rekikoirista poroihin ja lemmikkikarhuihin, ja Dee saa henkilokuntineen hoidettavakseen aaritapauksen jos toisenkin. Tarvittaessa apuun riennetaan tiettomien taipaleiden taa niin lentokoneella, moottorikelkalla kuin koirienkin vetamana.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Alkaa uusintana. Canopy Cat Rescue on erikoistunut puihin kiivenneiden kissojen pelastamiseen. Kun nelijalkainen saadaan vihdoin takaisin tukevasti maanpinnalle alkaa selvitystyo, kenen lemmikki on kyseessa.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Shaun ja Tom selvittavat, onko hadassa oleva kissa todella sita, mita sen omistaja vaittaa. Lisaksi Tom yrittaa tuoda kissan takaisin koiraystavansa luo.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Realitysarjassa Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. Villalobosin vaki saa haadon Kaliforniasta ja muuttaa New Orleansiin.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 9, osa 9. Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 3/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Epatoivoinen omistaja tuo vastaanotolle kultaisennoutajan, jonka jalka on murtunut. Jeff ryhmineen hoitaa myos beaglea, jonka kimppuun toinen koira on hyokannyt.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete loytaa taydellisen paikan meditaatiotilaa etsivan pariskunnan puumajalle. Tiimi rakentaa energialatautuneen tilan seitsenmetrisiin, toisiinsa kietoutuneisiin vaahteroihin.

programme.title: Shark Week Immersion
programme.desc: Syvyystiimi vastaa haikaloja koskeviin kysymyksiin laidasta laitaan. Popkulttuurin historiasta nostetaan esiin kuuluisia haikohtauksia ja niita kokeillaan tosielamassa.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat julkisten palveluiden ulkopuolella ja selviavat yhteispelilla.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat analysoivat uusia todisteita Chupacabra -nimisen legendaarisen verta imevan pedon olemassaolosta, ja olennosta saattaa olla olemassa jopa kaksi versiota!

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 7/10. Nelja raskaan sarjan kalamiesta ja ystavysta yhdistaa sarjassa voimansa, silla he haluavat olla ensimmaisina kalassa maailman syrjaisimmilla vesilla. Vaikka henki menisi. Paastakseen katkettyjen, mystisten vesien ja niissa piileskelevien tarunhohtoisten kalojen luo Chris, Thad, Brian ja Jay joutuvat mm. istumaan ratissa ajotunteja laskematta, taittamaan taivalta kiikkeralla lautalla ja raivaamaan tietaan kesyttomassa viidakossa. (Fish or Die, tosi-tv, USA, 2019)

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Alligaattori hyokkasi rapumertoja kokemassa olleen Wayne Petterwayn paalle Pohjois-Carolinassa. Arizonassa retkeilemassa ollut Peter Baca herasi, kun jokin hyokkasi teltan paalle.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson auttaa traumaperaisesta stressihairiosta karsivaa sotaveteraania, joka on alkanut ahdistua terapiakissastaan. Bartholomew repii hajalle paitsi huonekalut, myos avioliiton.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 4/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Big Cat Tales
programme.desc: Chongo is unwilling to share buffalo with the rest of the pride and Fig continues to give vital lessons to the young cub and a cheetah and hyena battle.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Bronxin elaintarha -sarjan tekijoiden ihanassa elainsarjassa katsojat viedaan lantisen pallonpuoliskon suurimman akvaariokonaisuuden kulissien taakse Yhdysvaltojen Atlantan Georgia Aquariumiin.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 8/9. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikekumppanit, parhaat ystavat ja toistensa kovimmat kilpailijat Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Amerikan suurinta akvaarioyritysta, Acrylic Tank Manufacturing.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 5. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Ross hoitaa kukkotappelun kahta osapuolta ja arvioi hyeenan kuntoa elainlaakari Lavignen kanssa. Elainlaakari Blue hoitaa halvaantunutta yorkshirenterrieria.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Realitysarja Teksasin riistanvalvojista, jotka suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin. Riistanvalvojat etsivat Lansi-Teksasin vuorilta arkoja isosarvisia lampaita. He jaljittavat jousella metsastavaa henkiloa, jonka oma riistakamera antoi hanet ilmi.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan elainlaakari Dee Thornellin elamaa Alaskan rajaseudulla. Hanen monenkarvaiseen asiakaskuntaansa kuuluu elaimia rekikoirista poroihin ja lemmikkikarhuihin, ja Dee saa henkilokuntineen hoidettavakseen aaritapauksen jos toisenkin. Tarvittaessa apuun riennetaan tiettomien taipaleiden taa niin lentokoneella, moottorikelkalla kuin koirienkin vetamana.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete lahtee rakentamaan jo toista puumajaansa Alaskaan! Han loihtii ulkoilma-teemaisen puumajan ja asentaa puuhun myos saunan.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Realitysarjassa Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. Tia ottaa hoiviinsa hylatyn koiran, joka karsii sydanmatotaudista. Comanche loytaa vastoin odotuksia uuden kodin, mutta sen terveys uhkaa estaa adoption.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 4/14. Krokotiilimiehena tunnetuksi tulleen Steve Irwinin perinto elaa hanen leskessaan Terrissa seka lapsissaan Bindissa ja Robertissa. Intohimoisina luonnonsuojelijoina he pyorittavat aivan erityislaatuista Australian elaintarhaa, jossa toimii myos huipputason villielainsairaala. (Crikey! Its The Irwins, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 8/9. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Pete loytaa taydellisen paikan meditaatiotilaa etsivan pariskunnan puumajalle. Tiimi rakentaa energialatautuneen tilan seitsenmetrisiin, toisiinsa kietoutuneisiin vaahteroihin.

programme.title: Toucan Nation
programme.desc: Elainkeskus Costa Ricassa hoitaa pahoin loukkaantunutta tukaania. Lintu saa uuden elaman 3D-tulostimella tehdyn nokkaproteesin avulla.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Syvalla Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa selvitaan vain yhteispelilla.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Realitysarja Teksasin riistanvalvojista, jotka suojelevat seka ihmisia etta elaimia Yhdysvaltain toiseksi suurimman osavaltion laajalla alueella. Tyopaivien aikana vastaan tulee kaikkea mahdollista salametsastajista tulvien uhreihin ja vaarallisiin villielaimiin. Riistanvalvojat etsivat Lansi-Teksasin vuorilta arkoja isosarvisia lampaita. He jaljittavat jousella metsastavaa henkiloa, jonka oma riistakamera antoi hanet ilmi.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Äskettain julkistetut aanitallenteet ja hammastyttavat valokuvat voivat olla tahan mennessa vakuuttavin todiste siita, etta Ozarkin ulvojalla voi olla demoninen alkupera.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Onkologi Jenny Helm hoitaa rakastettua perhekissa Mishaa, jonka rinnasta on loytynyt kyhmy. Irtokoiranpentu Ellie saapuu uuden tyyppiseen leikkaukseen.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: Koskettavia kertomuksia ihmisista, jotka taistelivat elainten hyokkayksia vastaan uhmaten kuolemaa ja valittamatta esteista tai seurauksista.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikekumppanit, parhaat ystavat ja toistensa kovimmat kilpailijat Wayde King ja Brett Raymer johtavat Amerikan suurinta akvaarioyritysta, Acrylic Tank Manufacturing.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 4. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 5. Elainlaakarit Blue, Ross ja Lavigne pyorittavat menestynytta klinikkaansa Houstonissa, jossa asiakaskunta koostuu kaikenkarvaisista lemmikeista. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2017)

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a Greek odyssey from Athenss port of Piraeus north to the city of Thessaloniki, where Greeces King George I was assassinated in 1913. 4/6

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Former Soccer Saturday buddies Jeff Stelling and Chris Kamara reunite for an epic journey across Sri Lanka where they reaffirm their friendship along the way.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle meets people who have moved to inhospitable parts of the world after leaving the rat race behind. Here he travels to the Namibian desert to spend time with 50-year-old Gideon David, who quit his career in life insurance to live in the largest conservation area in Africa. Ben embraces the harsh and relentless work of farm life in temperatures pushing 40C, tending more than 150 animals, repairing baboon damage to water pipes and learning how to castrate sheep with his teeth.

programme.title: Empire with David Olusoga
programme.desc: How did a small island create the biggest empire the world has ever seen? David Olusoga uncovers a living legacy.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Trees
programme.desc: Whilst humans are prone to fighting the inevitability of ageing, trees have perfected the art of aging gracefully. In this episode, we will discover how mature trees do incredible things to thrive in an often turbulent world, and may even work together to do so. 2/3

programme.title: Secret Amazon: Into The Wild
programme.desc: Lucy plunges further into the unknown reaches of the Amazon, coming face to face with hostile giant wasps, caiman-infested rivers, and more deadly snakes.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve travels to Gabon for the first time. Exploring Loango National Park, Steve goes in search of crocodiles, surprisingly deadly chimpanzees and feisty forest elephants.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo ventures deep into the Black Forest, where he discovers how Hansel and Gretel helped to unify the German nation. A masterclass in carving cuckoo clocks demonstrates how the nations reputation for quality and reliability in manufacturing was established. Later, at Goettingen University, the former politician discovers two sides of student life at the turn of the 20th century - the duelling fraternities and the ground-breaking scientists who laid the foundation of Germanys world-class transport technology.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Explorer Ben Fogle meets more people whove turned their back on the rat race and set up home in some of the most remote and inhospitable parts of the world. In this series, Ben meets Alex, a retail whizz-kid who left the UK for his own remote Portuguese mountain. He joins Georg and Bettina, a European couple whove found solace in the Irish wilderness. And Ben visits Sandy, whos swapped a career in the tourist industry to rescue animals on a Greek Island. He also meets Helen and Jason, tackling life in the Shetlands, the most northerly point in the UK. And in the US, Ben travels the deserts of Arizona with Dee, a modern-day nomad living life out of her van.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle meets Rhona Mitra who has swapped her home in Hollywood for a remote farmhouse in Uruguay.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Changing landscapes and animal patterns threaten the survival of those who dwell in the arctic. The Hailstones search for a once abundant food source quickly turns to desperation.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: Hadrians Wall once formed the N/W frontier of the Roman Empire. However new evidence reveals how the ruthless Roman military crossed over and took the fight to their enemy. 2/6

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores Britains largest bicycle factory, Cherry Healey gets pedal power tips from Cycling Team GB, and Ruth Goodman examines the history of folding bikes

programme.title: Planet Earth III
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals the extraordinary ways in which animals battle to survive in a world of extremes, from mountain summits to deserts, polar tundra to the worlds largest cave in Vietnam. On Ellesmere Island, a pack of Arctic wolves fight to rebuild their strength after one of the toughest winters on record, while in the mountains of Mexico, millions of Monarch butterflies huddle together to survive. But the calm is shattered when a storm hits their forest shelter

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo returns to Spain to trace the early 20th-century roots of the Spanish Civil War, which divided his Spanish family and sent his father into exile. He discovers a nation fractured at the time. 6/6

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The last of the snow melts in Alaska, and residents of the arctic make hay while the midnight sun shines. After a lean winter, Andy Bassich and Denise Becker search for fertile hunting grounds.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben heads Down Under to meet Bette, an elderly woman living alone in a ramshackle house in the wilds of northern Queensland. She is a no-nonsense personality and refuses to cook Ben any dinner. But as the week progresses she warms to her guest and explains what drew her to the harsh Australian wilderness 30 years ago. She also talks about her complex relationship with men, and reveals how she has been seriously threatened when defending the natural world around her from development.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: The mysterious origins of Stonehenge, the worlds most famous prehistoric monument, are revealed by the discovery of a nine-thousand-year-old stone circle submerged in the Mediterranean Sea.

programme.title: Mammals: Making Of
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the series that explores the most successful animal group on Earth, from the tiny Etruscan shrew to the largest mammal in existence - the blue whale. 4/6

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green walks in the footsteps of the brave soldiers of the D-Day landings in Normandy, France, on an emotional journey of sacrifice and courage. 4/8

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Mike Wozniak and Ola Labib head to one of the wildest places on Earth - the Namib desert - to meet for the first time and have each other for company on their journey.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: In Alaska, Ben Fogle meets Mike and Fran, who live in a self-built log cabin in a remote spot ten days walk from civilisation. The family have created a completely self-sufficient lifestyle, working the land and trapping animals.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green walks a beautiful but lesser-known route in the Douro Valley in Northern Portugal, rich in ancient art, wildlife and world-famous wine. 5/8

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The lads travel to Laos in search of the terrifyingly huge Devil catfish, but the dangerous journey involves eerie caves, raging rapids and evil underworld spirits that lurk in the Mekong River.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark
programme.desc: Steve Backshall is on a mission to create a new generation of shark saviours, but first he needs to find his team. Steve takes 12 young UK hopefuls to boot camp.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve heads to Norway to dive with the planets ultimate predator - the orca. He also witnesses the northern lights and gets up close to the mighty mouth of a humpback whale.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo returns to Spain to trace the early 20th-century roots of the Spanish Civil War, which divided his Spanish family and sent his father into exile. He discovers a nation fractured at the time. 6/6

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace helps to unload a tanker full of sugar from Norfolk and follows it through one of the oldest sweet factories in Britain - Swizzels in Derbyshire - to see how more than 500 workers, as well as some mind-boggling machines, transform it into over 100 million individual sweets within just 24 hours. Cherry Healey finds out how the letters are put in seaside rock and is given special access to the Fishermans Friend factory in Lancashire to discover how a local family turned a niche product into a worldwide success

programme.title: Planet Earth III
programme.desc: Join Sir David Attenborough on a journey through the ever-changing habitats of our world. Discover amazing landscapes, the most astounding fights of animals on our planet.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo ventures east through Romania. The beauty of the Carpathian mountains with their snow-clad granite peaks, gorges and lakes appears to him unchanged from their description in his 100-year-old guidebook. 1/6

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Special compilation episode following seven people who live in one of the worlds loneliest places. They must overcome snow storms, frozen terrain and limited resources to survive.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: A couple from Salt Lake City, Utah, decide to move to the mountainous coast of Shelter Cove, California.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: The breath-taking discovery of a warrior buried with priceless treasures offers archaeologists a unique insight into the birth of Europes first great civilisation.

programme.title: Mammals: Making Of
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the series that explores the most successful animal group on Earth, from the tiny Etruscan shrew to the largest mammal in existence - the blue whale.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Trees
programme.desc: We discover how trees can extend their lives by `walking across the land and planting new roots, how they can `learn from trauma, and how a decaying tree has the miraculous ability to nurture new life.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: David Harewood and best friend Fraser James swap the sets of Hollywood for a new challenge in Slovenia, where they face some of the most dangerous roads in Europe.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to the canyons of Utah to meet 72-year-old twins Bill and Bob Stone, who fled their adrenaline-junkie pasts for a tough subsistence lifestyle as they also deal with the challenges associated with growing old. He joins the brothers as they go cattle-wrangling, rock climbing and skydiving, while Ben also discovers more about them and why they decided to cut themselves off from civilisation. Once parachute instructors, police informants and bounty hunters, they are now organic farmers who are preparing for doomsday.

programme.title: Changing Planet
programme.desc: Two world-leading projects designed to tackle the crises facing Earths rivers come under the spotlight. 1/1

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMMonday 8 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Stockholm to the Arctic CircleSeason 7 Episode 6 of 10SSubtitlesMichael Portillo embarks on a thousand-mile journey from the Swedish capital of Stockholm to Abisko in the northern reaches of the Arctic Circle. In Stockholm, Michael braves a precarious tour of the city from its rooftops before boarding a heritage tram to get the lowdown on 1930s Sweden from an expert. Moving on, he finishes his journey deep in the Arctic Circle at a remote climate research station. He also has lunch with traditional Sami people in Vilhelmina and checks into an ice hotelGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Monday 8 January. (Subtitles.)TopicsLeisure hobbiesTourism ➝ TravelMichael PortilloPresenterAlison KrepsSeries EditorJohn ComerfordExecutive ProducerBen RowlandDirector

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa
programme.desc: Kausi 7, 1/10. Ilmassa on jannitysta ja kauhua, kun kilpailu kaynnistyy! Ensimmaisella viikolla ommellaan perusvaatteita. Kaavahaastessa valmistetaan naisten pusero, joka suljetaan niskasta napilla. Muodonmuutoksessa muokataan perusvaatteesta jotain paljon jannittavampaa. Lopuksi kilpailijat ompelevat preeriamekot.

programme.desc: 1/3. Vuonna 1886 laakari Sir Arthur Conan Doyle kirjoitti ensimmaisen Sherlock Holmes tarinansa ja muutaman vuoden kuluttua han ryhtyi kokopaivaiseksi kirjailijaksi. Han kuitenkin kyllastyi salapoliisinsa valtavaan suosioon ja vuonna 1893 han antoi taman kuolla.

programme.title: Sherlockin surma: Lucy Worsley ja Conan Doylen tapaus
programme.desc: Kun Sherlock Holmes oli tapettu, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle yritti paasta irti taman varjosta ja lahti mm. Etela-Afrikkaan, kirjoitti kansallismielisia teksteja ja loi myyntimenestyksen Baskervillen koira.

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa
programme.desc: Kausi 7, 3/10. Kolmannen viikon teeman on miesten vaatekaapin klassikot. Ompelijat valmistavat kaavahaasteessa bakerboy-lippalakin. Laadukkaista kankaista ommellut irtotakit saavat uuden elaman muodonmuutoshaasteessa. Lopuksi tehdaan urheilullinen takki.

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Kausi 10, 1/10. Uusi kausipyorahtaa kayntiin, ja mukana on 13 jannittynytta ja innostunutta leipuria. Bravuurihaasteessa valmistetaan hedelmakakku, jonka suhteen moni turvautuu suvun perinnereseptiin. Teknisessa haasteessa valmistetaan identtisia enkelikakkupaloja, ja suurhaasteessa toteutetaan syntymapaivakakku, josta lapsena haaveiltiin. Brittilaisessa leivontaohjelmassa innokkaat amatoorileipojat kisailevat toisiaan vastaan erilaisissa leivontahaasteissa.

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa
programme.desc: Kausi 4, 3/8. Myrkyn niellyt. Saint Marien historiallisen seuran puheenjohtaja murhataan myrkylla, ja kaikilla seuran jasenilla on pateva motiivi. Brittilais-ranskalainen rikossarja.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to impress the Mushlets by showing off his sensing gift. But his sense-foot doesn’t work like it should. This is a disaster! Mush-Mush discovers that the solution he’s looking for might be in The Dark Dark Forest. Mush-Mush decides to take his friends Chep and Lilit on a little trip...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings scribble all over the book Snow White on the living room sofa. Grizzy throws them off with scant ceremony and they crash to the floor with their book.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings favorite chocolate spread brand is organizing a big competition where the prize is a giant jar of spread. To win, one must make ten baskets in a row in a hoop set up on a supermarket parking lot for the occasion. Ready to play?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the infiltrating Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To finally be on an equal footing with Grizzys imposing build and throw their own weight around in the cabin, the Lemmings decide to wear a blowup sumotori costume. Grizzy is roughly chucked out of the living room area. He decides to follow a special sumo diet to become the strongest guy around.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations, and learn that chocolate spread was invented long, long ago.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories don’t always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep and Mush-Mush sometimes don’t listen to Lilit. So when she tries to tell them about her great idea to have a special firefly night, they instead believe it is their idea. Grrr! Whose special firefly night will come out on top?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Bolly hurts his foot and can’t go fast until it heals. Phooey! But when everyone gives him treats to cheer him up, Bolly decides he never wants his foot to heal.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is over-joyed when his weevil friend, Chase, returns to Mushton. But Chase seems to have changed, hes way harder to handle now. And he wants something from Chep! But what?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has to give the Mushlets a talk about spiders. But talking in front of a group makes Chep nervous. Mush-Mush offers to do it instead. Problem is Mush-Mush’s knowledge of spiders is so bad he ends up getting caught by one!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant sleep because its too hot. He decides to confiscate the fans the Lemmings use to power their fake spaceship. Totally into their Space Opera game, the Lemmings try to repel the alien Grizzy with laser party favors and are propelled onto an unknown planet: a volcano crater with a secret base where a rocket is ready to take off. The rocket carries the cabin into space. Its no longer a game: Grizzy and the Lemmings will have to face the dangers of outer space!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a racket game linked to a prize distributor on a gas station parking lot. The more times you hit the ball without letting it touch the ground, the bigger the prize. With a series of 1,000 consecutive exchanges, the prize is a giant jar of Yummy chocolate spread! Grizzy has no qualms about cheating to win, but the outcome against the Lemmings is never certain. For they have nerves of steel when the stakes are high.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is too hot and proposes the Lemmings an exchange: their ventilator, which they use to propel their skateboard in the air, for a baby ostrich Grizzy found outside the cabin and who can tow them. The Lemmings are delighted to play with their new baby friend who is overflowing with energy. But the baby’s parents have a different outlook and do not want their son taking risks. Thinking that Grizzy is the Lemmings’ father, they hold him accountable.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings play Hide-n-Seek and cannot refrain from sabotaging their game by revealing their hiding places. The Lemmings challenge him to play against them. The two sides outdo each other in cunning and trickery, but they are equally good. For the last decisive round, the opponents decide to extend the game zone to the entire savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzy’s liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings’ ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robot’s artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoo’s refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedia’s instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a native American Indian vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true, if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. There is nonetheless one little snag: the effects of the genies magic instantly wear off as soon as he returns to his vase and the lid shuts.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army: anyone hit with it becomes non-violent. They use the arm to transform Grizzy into a cherub, despite himself.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When they find a book on Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Once again, Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. The Lemmings find a way around this by increasing the power of a lamp that accelerates plant growth and instantly expand themselves to... bear size.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Gang travels back to Ancient Greece, where they play unique roles in a Greek mystery involving the mythological spider woman, Arachne, and her attempts to disrupt the royal wedding that would unite two great cities.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy is surprised to see his old childhood first crush has become a Goth. Embarrassed that he hasn’t changed at all, Shaggy attends a Goth party with the gang, allowing himself to become initiated into the Goth culture, much to Scooby’s concern - especially when the gang discovers there’s a ferocious plant monster roaming the corridors of the abandoned hospital the Goth’s call home.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister. / When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day. / Buff makes a wish on a magic artifact for the other Batwheels to be turned into monster trucks, just like him!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When King Tut steals an ancient artifact that makes his Carcophagus magically fast, MOE equips Bam with rocket boosters to catch the villain and Bam must learn how to control all that speed.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about ways to show kindness.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders take turns distracting Petunia as they build her a big surprise birthday cake in the back yard.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto smells something special in a holiday package, and in his eagerness to grab the gift he makes a mess of Metropolis’s festivities. / While escaping from a grizzly bear Ivandoe and Bert fall into an underground cave where a large Troll-woman in a party dress keeps them captive.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto embarks on a high-flying chase that creates major mayhem for a bus driver on his way to school. / The Bear is struggling against a greedy moth in his house. Trying to save his magic box he puts it on the porch and Masha finds the magic hat that can make her invisible

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does Mr Bean know Teddy? Could he drive a mini at the age of ten? How long has he known Mrs Wicket? Bean takes us on a journey into the past to answer these and many more questions.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesn’t have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he can’t remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine there’s only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Bean’s main concern is to get some money and get back to the baker’s before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own ‘No Littering’ signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentine’s Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irma’s attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a ‘date’ to the Valentine’s Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-teller’s prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Boss shows he’s still got it in the inventin’ department by coming up with a brain-swapping raygun. Just what the world needs. The Boss’ glory is short lived, though, when the raygun starts going off randomly. The Boss and Lamput trade places, and we get to see what it looks like when the worst boss in the world can also freak you out by morphing into orange stuff. Everyone’s acting topsy turvy, so it’s up to Specs and Skinny to straighten things out. Lucky those guys don’t have brains to swap.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pregnant Doc: During a chase, Specs accidentally swallows Lamput. The Docs plan to bring Lamput back to the lab! However, Specs gets misunderstood by bystanders as a pregnant mother in labor and gets dragged to a hospital against his will. While Specs gets used to being a mother-to-be, Skinny tries to get the two of them out of the hospital and back to the lab. Will Lamput stay in Spec’s tummy this whole time?Reverse: In a new attempt to catch Lamput, The Docs invent a remote that reverses anything back in time. Lamput must try to escape while constantly being pulled back into the Docs grasp!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pregnant Doc: During a chase, Specs accidentally swallows Lamput. The Docs plan to bring Lamput back to the lab! However, Specs gets misunderstood by bystanders as a pregnant mother in labor and gets dragged to a hospital against his will. While Specs gets used to being a mother-to-be, Skinny tries to get the two of them out of the hospital and back to the lab. Will Lamput stay in Spec’s tummy this whole time?Reverse: In a new attempt to catch Lamput, The Docs invent a remote that reverses anything back in time. Lamput must try to escape while constantly being pulled back into the Docs grasp!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings – using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To trick Grizzys vigilance and steal the TV, the Lemmings, disguised as traditional Chinese dancers, perform a number that leaves the bear flabbergasted. The rodents take advantage of their diversion to carry off the TV set on their airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas. But before they can escape with their bounty, Grizzy recovers the screen. Ever as determined, the Lemmings come back after upgrading their vessel.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down… especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger leave town with instructions for Tom to keep the house in order, but Jerrys got other ideas.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Madcap slapstick and mayhem as the celebrated cat and mouse plot against each other.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is tricked into helping an evil magician capture all of the mice in the village but Jerry Van Mouseling foils the magicians plans.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike leaves Tom in charge of his boy Tyke only to discover upon his return that Tyke now behaves more like a cat than a dog.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom falls into a manhole and finds a magic cloak that turns him into King of the Catacombs.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom, forced into driving a race car created by evil Dr. Otto, terrorizes the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling comes to their rescue.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Legion of Zoom is tired of always losing. They decide to take a page from the Batwheels and try using teamwork in order to pull off a daring heist. But will they be able to work together?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird sacrifices his stealth muffler tech to sound as loud as the other Batwheels but his modifications backfire when Robin needs his stealthy skills to catch the elusive Catwoman!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: It’s Christmas Eve, and Fred is ready to solve a Christmas mystery! Unfortunately, the town the gang has arrived in is being attacked by a Pterodactyl, and it doesn’t seem to have anything to do with Christmas!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar Ierland om het oude kasteel van de Blake-familie te bezoeken. Terwijl de gang onder de indruk raakt van het smaragden eiland, worden ze gedwongen te heroverwegen hoe geweldig de oude mythes en legendes daadwerkelijk zijn door een ontmoeting met een verwoestende reus.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Night has fallen, and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. He sees the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work and tries to distract the Lemmings and capture the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings don’t miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger argue on their anniversary, Cupid decides to get involved. However, he gets a head injury in a chase between Tom and Jerry and forgets who he is. Now its on Tom and Jerry to remind Cupid of his identity and help Ginger and Rick stop fighting.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop- a spray that creates a tiny cop that chases Jerry around.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry and Tuffy discover Gingers surprise for Rick in the garage: a brand-new air hockey table. They enjoy floating in zero gravity before Tom comes in and stops the fun. Soon, Butch challenges Tom to a game, until they start chasing Tuffy into the house and out back.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry break a picture frame on the wall, Rick gives Tom an ultimatum that hes out for good if he breaks one more thing. Despite Toms earnest response, he breaks something right after Rick leaves to purchase a new frame. Attempting to fix the problem, Tom borrows tools and coveralls from a repair truck nearby but cant stop breaking things in the repair process.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Jerry overhears that a brand-new butler will arrive at the household later that day, the crafty mouse whips together a butlers outfit and knocks on the door, pretending to be the new arrival—to get unbridled access to the pantry. How long will Jerrys disguise work, and what happens when the real butler arrives?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom goes through reverse evolution and is transformed into a swamp monster, he uses it to his advantage, scaring creatures that frightened him earlier. Soon he sees Van Mouseling in the woods and cant resist chasing him all over.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Kept awake by Tom watching TV, Jerry goes outside and encounters some lightning bugs. The smallest one cant keep up, so Jerry steals Toms energy drink for the little guy. It helps, but soon the super-charged bug causes unexpected issues for Tom and Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Skullie warns Tom that its almost midnight, so hed best be on alert for one of the Catsylvania ghouls to show up. Tom reaches for a towel to wipe the soap out of his eyes but is shocked to discover that hes not using a towel at all, but a Mummy-cats wrap! Soon, the Mummy-cat finds ways to freak out Tom and befuddle him, Jerry and Tuffy all over the house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry work to create a perfect perfume for Toodles, and end up creating a storm from the clouds of perfume.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: During a visit to Londons National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fears daft films about giant cats, blobs, and tiny dancing men. A trip to the cinema sends his imagination wild with hilarious, scary tricks.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create an irresistible rhythm on a set of magic drums and kick off a battle of the bands with Grizzy, who just wants a good nights sleep.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is hiding in a school, and the only way for the Docs to get him is to anti-age zap themselves back into childhood. (obviously)After stalking him in the corridors and unsuccessfully evading detention slips from the Headteacher, they find themselves in class. Skinny is rather happy to be back, but Specs doesnt like tests or art or chemistry or anything that distracts him from his true objective. Each time they almost get him, Lamput is saved by the bell (and even becomes the bell), and its a race against home time to see if they can get Lamput before the Headteacher gets them.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After repeated failures, the Docs finally realized what they were lacking: a good moustache! With their powerful facial hair, they are now unstoppable!

Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - don’t worry, we’ll have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irma’s brochure – a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too…

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A street mime artist takes a shine to Mr. Bean when the pair meet in the local park. Because Mr. Bean fails to pay him, the mime follows Mr. Bean to his apartment when hes not looking and breaks Mrs. Wickets water statue. But eventually, Mr. Bean manages to out-mime him!

programme.desc: Shaggy drags the gang to an arcade where hes determined to finally collect enough tickets to win the prize hes wanted since he was a boy. programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred gets a call for help from Chuck, his daredevil of a best friend, leading the gang on a rescue mission deep in the caverns of an ancient civilization.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile, Kitty, to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of Bat-Ball, but the Kitty Kitty is too wild to be contained, despite Bams best attempts to convince her to play along.

programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph.
