programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers lead Sushi-Mushi to believe that Pickled Swampost is Mushpot’s favourite dish when he cant stand it. Now they must try to stop Sushi-Mushi from serving this horrible food to Mushpot!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is the only Mushable who cant bend a small branch back to catapult himself between two trees. He feels weak and embarrassed. But when strength doesnt work, Chep realizes that its all in the technique!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: It seems like Starmush is the only one who can answer Mush-Mushs difficult questions. But Starmush lives so far away in the Dark Forest! Mush-Mush hatches a plan to get Starmush to move to Mushton, so he can get answers right here at home.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep and Mush-Mush sometimes don’t listen to Lilit. So when she tries to tell them about her great idea to have a special firefly night, they instead believe it is their idea. Grrr! Whose special firefly night will come out on top?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Bolly hurts his foot and can’t go fast until it heals. Phooey! But when everyone gives him treats to cheer him up, Bolly decides he never wants his foot to heal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements. When carried out, the exercises generate a ball of energy! The Lemmings test out the sequence of movements on… Grizzy, until he is evicted from the cabin and falls onto the temple in turn. His fall unveils a new sequence of movements on a fresco that could create an even stronger energy flow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings – using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To trick Grizzys vigilance and steal the TV, the Lemmings, disguised as traditional Chinese dancers, perform a number that leaves the bear flabbergasted. The rodents take advantage of their diversion to carry off the TV set on their airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas. But before they can escape with their bounty, Grizzy recovers the screen. Ever as determined, the Lemmings come back after upgrading their vessel.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero ‘Super Spy’ and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers’ house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters. So they take her on a monster hunt and find more than they imagined.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to be brave enough to join in the daring games that Mush-Mush and Lilit like to play. So he gets some protective moss pants that make him not only indestructible but also fashionable… and a bit cocky. Woo, it’s the new Chep!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush really wants to get over his fear of snakes. Truff really wants to get over his fear of ants. So they team up to help each other overcome their fears ... maybe.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpot offers to look after the Mushies so Mushpie can get a well-earned rest. He thinks it will be easy. It is not easy! The Mushies end up pushing both Mushpot and Starmush to their limit.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Sushi-Mushi’s excitement and pride over Chanterelle doing a portrait of him to hang in his restaurant turns to worry. What if his friends don’t like it? But, of course, Chanterelle would never let that happen.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry fancies himself an artist, but Tom disagrees. Their artistic antics blur lines between art and chaos. Other than a trail of mess, what else will they leave behind?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings’ hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzy’s discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An eclipse prevents the solar panels from supplying the cabin with electricity and Grizzy is disgruntledbecause he can’t watch TV. When he discovers that the Lemmings are using fireflies to have a party withoutelectricity, Grizzy evicts the Lemmings and recovers the fireflies to fuel the solar panels. The Lemmingshappen upon a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings recover a jar of Yummy from an automatic distributor but before they can enjoy it Grizzy confiscates the treat. In exchange, he leaves them the keyring that came as a gift. The Lemmings aren’t interested until the keyring lands in a magic vial which gives it an extraordinary power: stick the keyring onto any object and it will shrink to the size of a plastic miniature figurine!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is jealous of the Lemmings’ new game: an interactive dance mat connected to the TV where the idea is to jump around and perform dance sequences. As they fight over the mat, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a hidden mechanism in one of the Great Wall of China’s watchtowers. The mechanism activates a game on the wall’s paving stones that is similar to the interactive mat, only life size. On your marks, get ready, dance!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings, who are both starving, discover a temple dedicated to an ancestral brioche. According to the book lying open inside the temple, to obtain a perfect brioche you must gather three gold ingredients and set them on the altar. When the panda idol who guards the temple receives the offering, the person will receive his favorite food in abundance. Grizzy and Lemmings set out to find the sacred ingredients but there is no question of working together. May the best critter win!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: An integrated circuit containing an artificial intelligence accidentally connects to Grizzy’s stuffed teddy bear, which comes to life like a modern-day Pinocchio. Grizzy educates the chip until it decides to connect to the Lemmings’ robot to play with them. When the AI becomes a teenager, it is no longer interested in either Grizzy or the Lemmings and prefers using a smartphone to keep learning. Grizzy and the Lemmings join efforts to try and reset the chip’s memory and relive its childhood phase over and over.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a large silkworm that produces an extremely soft and resilient elastic thread ad infinitum. The Lemmings consider the worm the ideal game companion, but Grizzy needs the worm to make his knitwear. To become masters of the silkworm, the close enemies will go to harsh extremes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread, which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. And since the Lemmings are both prudent and cunning, its impossible to surprise them when they pay a visit to their secret hoard. Until the day Grizzy discovers a magic ring that enables him to take on the appearance of a Lemming.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Catch the best Shaggy episodes in these thrilling adventures. From mystery-solving to ghost-hunting, theres no quest too tricky for the gang!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred’s worst nightmare comes true when an evil spirit possesses the Mystery Machine and turns his beloved van into an unrelenting monster out to destroy him and the gang before they can solve the mystery.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly. / When Harley Quinn’s Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Harley Quinn’s Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her. / A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny rock us with some groovy moves!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a float to lead the Flower Parade, but Porky won’t settle for anything less than Porky Perfect.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a rollercoaster for Looneyburg. Bugs and Daffy soon get caught up trying to prove their part of the coaster is the best.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Magg’s pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one that’s perfect but is outraged when he’s told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers he’s one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find it’s closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his ‘princess’. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their ‘relaxing’ holiday!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n’ span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, it’s chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs And Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The neighbors cat turns out to be a hipster whose laidback attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed, Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry battles Tom to save a crab from becoming the Duke and Duchess main course.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After taking the heat again from Ginger for Jerrys shenanigans, fed-up Tom decides to pack his bags and go home to his birth family. But can you ever really go home again?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired by Dixie Wolf to find all the sheep that have gone missing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Frankenstein turns Tom into a colossus and Tom ends up terrorizing the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling saves the day.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A guilty conscience causes Butch to change his ways. But Tom, Jerry, Spike and Tuffy quickly decide they like the old Butch better.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batcomputer shuts down for a system update, the other Batwheels must take over for her while aiding Batman in a battle against Harley Quinn.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: MOE wants to know what its like to be a member of the Batwheels, but the bot gets more than he bargained for when Bam invites him along for an exciting mission to stop Poison Ivy.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang enters the heart of the American Gothic South in order to help an attractive farmer who Fred wants to impress with his mystery-solving prowess. A horrifying Scarecrow has come to life and attempts to drive everyone off his farm.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang is honored to take part in the wedding of two close friends. But can Best Man Shaggy and Maid of Honor Daphne save their friend’s perfect day before it’s ruined by a tragic Ghost Bride bent on destroying everyone else’s happily ever after?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and won’t come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to “gold leaf” the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that it’s his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game “Floor is Lava.” They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play “for real”!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals’ features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, it’s an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases one’s sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy is about to go to bed, he ousts the Lemmings who are holding a surprise party in the cabin. The Lemmings land in a Mayan Temple devoted to the moon. While toying with an ancestral console, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon that brings the moon, which is now the size of a disco ball, to the temple. In its aura, gravity becomes very weak. Enough to get rid of Grizzy and have a very original fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy does his best to get rid of the Lemmings and enjoy some peace and quiet in the cabin, but each time they come back with a new and even more-disturbing activity. When he sees some penguins marching in a perfectly disciplined line, Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence. He locks himself up with them inside the garage, which has been transformed into an elementary school classroom. Grizzy is determined to make discipline reign but he has forgotten about the Lemming’s natural penchant for bedlam.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Butch both arrive to ask out Toodles, their competitive behavior prompts her to send them away to a charm school she recently attended. But how will they fare in the grueling etiquette courses taught by elegant cat instructors?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Things go awry when Cates orders Tom to clean and inspect the family automobile. Tom, Jerry and Tuffy end up taking the car into the countryside and doing their best to control it. As Tom reads and attempts to follow the instruction manual, Jerry and Tuffy help, but they also suffer many near-misses.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch gets muscled out of his alley by a bullying runt of an alley cat and Tom, Jerry and Spike team up to help Butch win back his territory (and keep him out of theirs).

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Bedfordshire Bertie, a champion show horse, runs away and hides on the estate grounds, where Jerry does his best to help her hide from nosey Tom. Bertie is stressed out over a big upcoming meet, but Jerry has a calming effect on her. When Tom catches up with them, he, too, helps the horse overcome her nerves and get back to her old self.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A magicians hat is left behind at Ginger and Ricks house. Jerry runs into it, but when Tom reaches in after him, all he gets are multiple magician props. Tyke and Spike soon join in, and the top hat continues to wreak havoc.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, a strange flying bug bites Tom, transforming him into a Tom-sized bug monster. Van Mouseling saves the village with an old-fashioned canister of bug poison, and Tom flies off to the abandoned castle on the hill. But Toms troubles arent over yet! Inside, he must deal with huge spider webs and a spider the size of a truck.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the sponge turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estates new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger places her grannys old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as its sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guy’s making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: MOE wants to know what its like to be a member of the Batwheels, but the bot gets more than he bargained for when Bam invites him along for an exciting mission to stop Poison Ivy.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile, Kitty, to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of Bat-Ball, but the Kitty Kitty is too wild to be contained, despite Bams best attempts to convince her to play along.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is up to his usual nonsense, but two can play at this game as they take their chase into the neighbourhood. Leave it to Jerry to turn the tables on Tom!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Hector hires The Looney Builders to build him a burger restaurant, but Daffy is so focused on beating his handheld game that he causes major setbacks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders help Petunia build a greenhouse, she can’t wait for the veggies to grow and does everything she can to speed up the process.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In order to please Boss, the Docs plan to catch Lamput to surprise him on his birthday, but it looks like their colleagues have the same idea. A fierce race begins!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Victory! The Docs finally catch Lamput but the timing could not be worse, because Boss Mom is here to visit and she does not take kindly to her friend Lamput being imprisoned. Against his better judgement but to please his mother, Boss orders the Docs to chaperone and serve Boss Mom and Lamput as they spend time shopping, being pampered and spoiling themselves. Lamput cant believe his luck and the Docs cant believe theirs either! But when Boss Mom finds herself in mild peril, theres a chance of redemption and the possibility of a her finding a new favourite.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs And Skinny are late to work and Boss is mighty angry! The Docs cook up a quick, fake story of how they were chasing Lamput all over the city. It was a real tough chase across various terrains and thats what got them late to work!Boss calmly hears out their story and then opens his cabinet to show Lamput already caught and sitting there in a jar! The Docs sweat! We now see the Docs running all over the various terrains of the city with Boss chasing them on his scooter!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But he’s so engrossed he doesn’t notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is done with Teddy for a while and buys a parrot as a new friend. However, it turns out not to be easy to smuggle the parrot past his landlady and her cat Scrapper. And then he also has to get that bird to talk.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Its Scoobys dream come true as the gang visits the set of his favorite TV show and he meets the star, his celebrity crush, a dog actress who plays a detective on the screen. Now all Scooby has to do is work up the courage to actually talk to her while also solving the mystery of the monstrous Gargoyle attacking the production!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om het mysterie op te lossen van de enge Crystal Crawler - een vleermuisachtig monster - moet de gang de Crystal Canopy in - een doolhof van complexe kristalformaties. Om het nog erger te maken, kunnen ze niet praten in de Canopy, omdat zelfs het kleinste beetje geluid ervoor kan zorgen dat alle kristallen om hen heen zullen vallen.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Ondanks dat Velma een hekel heeft aan water, gaat de gang aan boord van een cruiseschip van Freds neef. Maar een waterfobie is hun minste zorg wanneer een angstaanjagend zeemonster het schip aanvalt.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om het mysterie op te lossen rondom een spookachtige artiest die ronddwaalt in haar voormalige concerthal, moet de gang doen alsof ze een rockband zijn! Maar kunnen ze de zaak oplossen voor dat Velma het podium op moet en moet zingen?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred is excited to visit The Vault - a high security prison from which no convict has ever escaped. But when the ghost of Stealing Stan (JOHN DiMAGGIO), an inmate who always claimed to be innocent, terrorizes the prison, Fred has to solve the mystery and rethink his stance on criminal justice!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred wisselt van plek met Jeff, de tourgids in het geschiedenismuseum, zodat hij de gang kan helpen een mysterie op te lossen. Het mysterie: een angstaanjagende Egyptische krokodilgod terroriseert het museum. Het probleem: Fred is onmiddellijk jaloers op de nieuwe vent en wil het mysterie oplossen voordat Jeff de kans krijgt, met de hulp van de kinderen uit de tourgroep van Jeff.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When the Looney Builders build themselves a playground, Daffy gets so excited about his section that he takes all the supplies for himself.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mac and Tosh Gopher to build them a home underground. Daffy cant remove rocks from the area fast enough and fails to ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bizzy Buzzards mom hires The Looney Builders to build her family a new nest. Bizzy wants to help but keeps getting in the way creating all sorts of problems for the crew.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Hoots Talon to expand and paint the old library. / The Looney Builders build Tibs Squirrel a closet in his tree, but it won’t fit all of Tibs’ stuff and he doesn’t want to get rid of anything.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by the Mouse Sisters to build a bridge over a mac and cheese spill. / The Mouse Sisters hire The Looney Builders to build a cheese cafe featuring a mural by Sylvester who is having a bad day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel - if he can convince her to stop playing long enough to focus on their mission!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi wishes she could live a rule-free life like Jestah, so she decides to only focus on having fun instead. But when her actions put Batgirl in danger, Bibi must put the fun aside to stop Harley and save her hero.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guy’s making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is over-joyed when his weevil friend, Chase, returns to Mushton. But Chase seems to have changed, hes way harder to handle now. And he wants something from Chep! But what?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has to give the Mushlets a talk about spiders. But talking in front of a group makes Chep nervous. Mush-Mush offers to do it instead. Problem is Mush-Mush’s knowledge of spiders is so bad he ends up getting caught by one!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters. So they take her on a monster hunt and find more than they imagined.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to be brave enough to join in the daring games that Mush-Mush and Lilit like to play. So he gets some protective moss pants that make him not only indestructible but also fashionable… and a bit cocky. Woo, it’s the new Chep!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush really wants to get over his fear of snakes. Truff really wants to get over his fear of ants. So they team up to help each other overcome their fears ... maybe.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpot offers to look after the Mushies so Mushpie can get a well-earned rest. He thinks it will be easy. It is not easy! The Mushies end up pushing both Mushpot and Starmush to their limit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down… especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Alien Highway
programme.desc: After an informant relays a story of an alien that reportedly escaped from Area 51, Chuck and the team head to Tonopah, NV, to investigate whether this creature still roams the area.

programme.title: Killers Of The Cosmos
programme.desc: Earth is hit by 100 tons of rock from space every day. Most burn up in the atmosphere, but a single rock wiped out the dinosaurs, could it happen again?

programme.title: Killers Of The Cosmos
programme.desc: The repercussions from the death of a star can be felt throughout the universe, but no effect is more lethal than a blast from the explosion concentrated on a single point, which would destroy all living things wherever this missile lands.

programme.title: Savage Builds
programme.desc: Adam joins forces with a NASA engineer to rebuild a rocket-propelled super weapon. Originally built to breach barbed wire in WWII, they aim to fix its fatal flaws.

programme.title: Extreme Engineering
programme.desc: Danny explores the Port of Rotterdam, where crews are in the middle of the largest Earth-moving project in history, to triple the ports capacity.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: This episode demonstrates the production processes for Chemical Tank Pressure Vents, Candy Wafers, Food Trucks, and Traditional Ropes and shows how each is made.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look is taken at the manufacturing of various products to be assembled in a step-by-step factory process, featuring a glimpse into how graphene, the worlds smallest car, force testers and composite cans are made and distributed.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: This episode demonstrates the production processes for LED Tubes, Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars, and Robotic Medication Dispensers and shows how each is made.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Follow the art of crafting a surfboard starting with a white polyurethane base, making stickers, the mass production of popular sandwich cookies and learn how concrete tiles are made and why they offer versatility, protection and utility savings.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Ever wondered how a Lotus Evora is made? Join the How Its Made crew as they go to its birthplace and explore its gorgeous exterior.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items go under the microscope as the production methods behind objects including kimchi and traditional parquet floors are revealed.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the process involved in the creation process of various objects including watches made almost entirely from wood, raw pet food intended to simulate a natural diet, steel bicycles and replica police lanterns is presented.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items go under the microscope. How are objects including calissons and diving watercrafts made?

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: More everyday items go under the microscope, revealing how objects including artist brushes, DEF tank heaters, game tables and art glass wall sconces are made.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: When the Soviet Union unveils its own space shuttle, the CIA hatches a revenge plot. Plus, a missing nuclear weapon could threaten a NASA base in the Arctic.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: A NASA spacecraft suffers a malfunction in orbit - can its lone astronaut make it back to Earth? Plus, new evidence emerges over Yuri Gagarins mysterious death.

programme.title: Alien Highway
programme.desc: A series of recent UFO sightings brings Chuck Zukowski s team to Missouri, the home of the 1973 Piedmont lights incident. Is history repeating itself?

programme.title: Richard Hammonds Big
programme.desc: Richard explores Volkswagens giant car plant in Wolfsburg, Germany. He checks out its futuristic technology and discovers how this mega-factory works!

programme.title: Richard Hammonds Big
programme.desc: Richard takes flight aboard the US Air Forces biggest cargo plane: The C-5M Super Galaxy. Climbing inside its inner workings he learns why its a record breaker.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: Ever wondered how a Maserati Quattroporte made? Join the How Its Made crew as they go to its birthplace, explore the inner workings and its gorgeous exterior.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The sleek design, gorgeous interior and incredible inner workings of the Weismann MF5 are thoroughly examined in order to gain a better understanding of how such a stunning piece of machinery can grow from design concept to reality.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The creation of the sharp lines and ferocious power of the Lambroghini Aventador is examined in order to gain a better understanding of the intricate details and complex craftsmanship that goes into making the high-end vehicle.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The essence of freedom and excitement is perfectly captured with the Jaguar F-Type as the slick roadster provides drivers with everything they need to satisfy their desires for speed and luxury with its incomparable design.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: A look is taken at the intricate processes involved in creating some of the most luxurious and exotic vehicles in the world, featuring the innovative inner workings and gorgeous, sleek exterior of the Bentley Continental GT.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars
programme.desc: The development of car manufacturing processes, continuing with a visit to the birthplace of the Alfa Romeo 4C to reveal its inner workings.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob Nelson investigates the mysterious rocks at the bottom of Lake Michigan known as Underwater Stonehenge. Plus, the search for escape tunnels in Alcatraz.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob Nelson searches for strange tunnels under Denvers airport, capitol building, and downtown, in order investigate rumors of a secret group that operates underground; Rob tries to uncover old secrets of a giant, serpent-shaped mound.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: A mysterious ninth planet lurks in the outer reaches of our solar system and it’s a giant -- ten times the mass of the Earth, in fact! Astronomers are yet to capture an image of this mysterious world but they can speculate what it might be like. Now were digging in to find out if its a volcanic super-Earth, an icy mega-Pluto or a gaseous giant like Neptune.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: The Universe is a violent and dangerous place. From exploding stars and colliding galaxies to nebula shockwaves - what are the worst places in the Universe?

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Recent discoveries could explain how supermassive black holes grow so big, one of the universes most mysterious questions. Neither dark matter nor cannibalism can fully explain these monsters, but the latest science might finally provide an answer.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Discover how Grammy Awards and bicycle lights are made. Also, explore how above-ground pools and foldable solar panels are constructed.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: The host goes behind the scenes to factories and industrial sites to learn how workers make industrial wire ropes, create living walls out of hedges, contrast large format cameras that can produce enormous prints and refine gemstones.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Viewers are given a glimpse at the fascinating world behind chocolate coins, the process of constructing floor heating systems, the history behind the pedal cars that children have enjoyed for years, and how swords are recreated in latex.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Viewers are given an in-depth look into the lavish world of farmed caviar, the elaborate production of intake manifolds, the fascinating process of creating durable motorcycle jackets, and manufacture of shovels and spades.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Viewers are given a look into the fascinating process of creating wax figures, which go back to the Middle Ages, the production and development of the sandwich cracker, and an introduction into the extensive history and creation of pewter tankards.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Viewers are given a glimpse into the fascinating construction of pipe cleaners, the history of stilton blue cheese, known for its characteristically strong smell and taste, the benefits of smart electric meters, and the production telescopes.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Experts discuss theories related to the worlds most famous cryptid, Bigfoot. Recently uncovered evidence unveils a creature far fiercer than previously believed.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Experts explore a new theory surrounding Scotlands Loch Ness Monster. The creature may not only be real, but possibly more dangerous than ever imagined.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle
programme.desc: Experts examine whether an interdimensional portal in the Alaska Triangle led to the disappearance of an aeroplane carrying 44 military personnel in 1950.

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle
programme.desc: Seasoned Bigfoot hunters investigate whether a huge, ape-like beast is responsible for a string of disappearances and mutilations in the remote Alaskan wilderness. New evidence suggests woolly mammoths may have found safe haven in Alaska.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: A mysterious ninth planet lurks in the outer reaches of our solar system and it’s a giant -- ten times the mass of the Earth, in fact! Astronomers are yet to capture an image of this mysterious world but they can speculate what it might be like. Now were digging in to find out if its a volcanic super-Earth, an icy mega-Pluto or a gaseous giant like Neptune.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: The Universe is a violent and dangerous place. From exploding stars and colliding galaxies to nebula shockwaves - what are the worst places in the Universe?

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Recent discoveries could explain how supermassive black holes grow so big, one of the universes most mysterious questions. Neither dark matter nor cannibalism can fully explain these monsters, but the latest science might finally provide an answer.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters

programme.title: Truth Behind the Moon Landing
programme.desc: The NASA tapes that recorded the Apollo 11 moon landing are missing. Experts examine whether their disappearance is part of a cover-up.

programme.title: Truth Behind the Moon Landing

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Viewers are given an in-depth look into the lavish world of farmed caviar, the elaborate production of intake manifolds, the fascinating process of creating durable motorcycle jackets, and manufacture of shovels and spades.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Viewers are given a look into the fascinating process of creating wax figures, which go back to the Middle Ages, the production and development of the sandwich cracker, and an introduction into the extensive history and creation of pewter tankards.

programme.title: Alien Highway
programme.desc: A Missouri man who claims UFOs are stalking him contacts Chuck and the team for help. Their investigation uncovers a dark secret which may explain this reported activity.

programme.title: Alien Highway
programme.desc: A series of strange animal deaths and UFO sightings brings Chuck to Colorado. Reports of authorities ignoring these incidents suggest a government cover-up.

programme.title: Alien Highway
programme.desc: Chuck receives a map supposedly leading to a hidden cache of recovered materials from the Roswell incident. He and his team go on an epic treasure to find them.

programme.title: Richard Hammonds Big
programme.desc: Richard explores one of the worlds biggest man-made engineering projects: the Kolnbrein Dam, which can hold back an incredible 200 million tonnes of water!

programme.title: Richard Hammonds Big
programme.desc: Richard joins the crew of one of the biggest moving objects on earth, The Marie Maersk container ship, on her continuous 28,000-mile voyage from Asia to Europe.

programme.title: How Its Made: Dream Cars

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob Nelson goes on a hunt for a mass grave that could reveal the dark secret of Americas industrial past; high in the mountains, Rob uses cutting-edge technology to figure out why a large lake is mysteriously disappearing.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob examines bizarre markings that suggest a violent clash between prehistoric beasts. In California, he explores if a strange lake is a home to alien life.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Life once existed on Mars, but a series of devastating mass extinctions have made present-day life nearly impossible. The latest science shows how Martian life keeps bouncing back as it transforms from a blue watery world like Earth into a desert planet.

programme.title: How the Universe Works

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.desc: Bluey opettelee puistossa ajamaan pyoralla, mutta se tuottaa vaikeuksia. Han innostuu kuitenkin yrittamaan sita uudelleen, kun katsoo isansa kanssa, miten maaratietoisesti hanen ystavansa suoriutuvat omista tehtavistaan.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Kun Isa vie Blueyn ja Bingon vaunuretkelle puistoon aikaisin aamulla, Bluey ei malta odottaa paastakseen rakkaalle kiipeilytelineelleen. Karsivallisyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun Isa pysahtyy juttelemaan ystaviensa kanssa. Turhautunut Bluey keskeyttaa aikuisten keskustelut. Isa kaskee olemaan kohtelias, mutta vasta kun han huomaa Bingon leikkivan onnellisena, han tajuaa itsekin voivansa leikkia. Kun Isa seuraavan kerran pysahtyy juttelemaan bussipysakin lahelle, Bluey kehittaa Bingon kanssa oman bussileikkinsa ja houkuttelee Isankin mukaan. Kun kiire on ohi, Bluey rentoutuu ja nauttii matkasta.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Isabella lahettaa Finiakselle kirjeen tunnustaen todelliset tunteensa, mutta katuu heti paatostaan ja koettaa epatoivoissaan saada sen takaisin. Tollo keksii Takauma-maattorin kaantaakseen huonon onnensa./Tollo keksii eraan ”naattorin” ja naamioituu pizzalahetiksi saadakseen kuumaa pizzaa, mutta sade osuu Candaceen, ja han kayttaa pizzalahettiolemustaan selvittaakseen, mista pojat pitavat.

programme.desc: Marinettella on koulusta lomaa ja kaikki on hyvin… kunnes han saa tietaa, etta Adrienin piti menna Shanghaihin, Kiinaan, isansa kanssa. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace vaihtaa paikkaa kaksoisolentonsa, Druselsteinin prinsessan, kanssa ja Finias ja Ferb rakentavat jattilaisjukeboksin. Silla valin Perry yrittaa estaa Tollontyota pilaamasta kaupungin uuden oopperatalon avajaisia. / Vanhemmat ovat matkoilla ja Candace kutsuu pari kaveriaan kylaan, mutta pian illanvietosta kasvaa valtavat juhlat. Tollontyo yrittaa saada kerrostalon haviamaan voidakseen katsoa naapurin drive-in -teatterin elokuvia ilmaiseksi.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa… vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Kula valmistub huvastijatupeoks. Proua Tishell avastab, et ta ei suuda Martini lahkumisega leppida, ja otsustab teha, mida oskab, et doktor jaaks. Martin ja Louisa lahevad kadunud Tibupoega otsima. Martiniga juhtub rank õnnetus, mis paneb teda elule hoopis teise pilguga vaatama.

programme.title: Tana õhtul..
programme.desc: Hendrik Sal-Saller on olnud popstaar viimased 25 aastat. Sellele vaatamata vajab ta jatkuvalt tutvustamist, sest iga kord selgub midagi uut! Smilersit kusitlevad ja kontserti kuulavad ansambli sõbrad, kulalised ning fannid ja saatejuht Vahur Kersna.
